entry.summary: In this context, the conversation revolves around discussing anti-double spend measures for Bitcoin. The author suggests starting a separate thread for this topic. Another member of the conversation, Isidor Zeuner, raises concerns about potential steps that could lead to double spending in Bitcoin. The author links to a post by Satoshi Nakamoto which explains how the protocol rules prevent double spending assuming they are followed. However, the author acknowledges that if people abandon the original Bitcoin design, the network may break down and there could be a failure of "Bitcoin," though it is debatable.
